service_name: Drupal Agile Software Development as a Platform
page_content:
flowmoco

Drupal Agile Software Development as a Platform

Flowmoco as a digital design & development studio has taken a strategic decision to specialise solely in Drupal development as a digital platform. We use this to build mobile applications and content-rich responsive websites for Enterprise, many with complex transactional or systems integration requirements, always using our hybrid agile methodology.

Features

  • Not technology agnostic, we are Drupal specialists
  • Well planned, with a hybrid agile methodology applied throughout
  • Platform agnostic, with responsive solutions across devices and outputs
  • Integrated, working with other systems and APIs or creating them
  • Cloud-hosted, in secure Tier 4 data centres, Safe Harbour certified
  • Flexible, allowing for future development and enhancements over time
  • Open source, taking the best work from thousands of developers
  • Secure, providing peace of mind and protection in the code-base
  • Bespoke, matching your requirements precisely after initial scoping
  • Powerful, allowing many thousands of users to work simultaneously

Benefits

  • Workflow tools to control which admin users can control content
  • Web services to allow external systems to share data
  • Publishing tools to update multiple sites or platforms together
  • Personalisation tools to allow front-end users filter their content
  • Powerful search tools with auto-indexing to surface content to users
  • Responsive layouts to display content over multiple devices and platforms
  • Cost savings, from using an open-source technology without licence costs
  • Engaging tools, calculators and content for users to easily access
  • Analytical tools, to show effectiveness, engagement and use online
  • Supported, backed with an SLA for availability, support and maintenance

Pricing

£650 to £750 per unit per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Other
